mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts(user_no, post_title, post_content, post_write_datetime, post_check_hide, post_hits) VALUES (${num}, #{Post.title}, #{Post.content}, #{Post.writeDate} , false, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE Posts SET post_title='${title}', post_content='${content}', post_modify_dateTime='${date}' WHERE post_no = #{id}
